attributes.action: To have hospital shop prices to be the same as shops on the High Street
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I visited my grandfather in hospital the other day and I was shocked and disgusted that the hospital shop charged 25p more for a bag of sweets than the store of the same chain in the city centre. It wasn't just sweets. It was pens, chocolate etc.

Most hospitals don't have any other shops nearby and even with rip off prices at hospital car parking, the last thing hospitals should do is expect the shops to charge extra.
